title: Без башни
overview: There are 9 characters in the program, each with a bright personality. They all go out into the city to carry out their special mission. They provoke, argue, misbehave... In general, they use all possible means to bring out various emotions in unsuspecting people on the street.At this time, a hidden camera is watching them - the resulting stories are watched in the studio by viewers, the host of the show Dominic Joker and a jury consisting of three show business stars. The author and participant of the most reckless story becomes the winner, he is awarded a prize - an Oscar statuette without brains.
